originalText.text: I would like to thank the attorney Mine Gur and her team of paralegals, they have helped my family with our green card applications and citizenship applications. She has guided us step by step and requested all the documents she needed so that we had no issues with immigration. After she submitted each of our applications, she always contacted us to remind us about every appointment and updated us of any notifications by immigration. She went to the interviews with us and we had no issues with immigration. She is very honest and patient, she told us from the beginning if our application would get approved or not. I recommended Mine Gur to my friends and family and they always got satisfied with the results. I will always recomend Mine Gur to anyone with immigration concerns, she is simply the best. Thank you again mine Gur and team, may God bless you!

originalText.text: With my previous lawyers, I had unpleasant experiences including late submissions, miscalculated applications and missing documentation. With Mine, I had none of these. She was responsive, careful, and attentive to my immigration problems. Thanks to her I have my green card now.

text.text: With my previous lawyers, I had unpleasant experiences including late submissions, miscalculated applications and missing documentation. With Mine, I had none of these. She was responsive, careful, and attentive to my immigration problems. Thanks to her I have my green card now.

originalText.text:
I and my husband experience with Ms. Gur were more than amazing.
We contacted her regarding our immigration case last minute in 2017 since our previous lawyer didn't represent us in our best interest.

From the moment we contacted her and discussed our situation with her, she made us feel very comfortable due to her incredible knowledge and kindness. She is certainly one of the most organized, pro-active, and knowledgeable professionals we've ever met.
During the process, Ms. Gur always kept us up to date which made things easy and pleasant.

We cannot thank Ms. Gur enough for the outstanding work she has done for us. We're so glad to choose her to represent us in our rather difficult case. After this difficult case, she got our another O1-03 Visa and she's currently working on our EB1 Green Card process.

She is outstanding in her work and is overall such a wonderful person.  We're very grateful to have had her as our attorney.
We highly recommend Ms. Gur.
